queries.query:
match (l:OccupationLabel)  where l.skos__prefLabel in [ 'actor/actress', 'administrative assistant', 'immigration officer', 'steward/stewardess', 'residential care home worker', 'chief executive officer', 'civil engineer', 'building', 'construction worker', 'electrician', 'emergency medical dispatcher', 'mixed farmer', 'member of parliament', 'executive assistant', 'police officer', 'postman/postwoman', 'primary', 'school teacher', 'sales assistant', 'social worker', 'train driver', 'waiter/waitress']
return { ContentType: 'OccupationLabel', GraphSyncPart:{Text:l.uri}, TitlePart:{Title:l.skos__prefLabel}} order by l.uri
skip 0 limit 400
